00014 #ifndef JPATH_MATCH_HANDLER_H
00015 #define JPATH_MATCH_HANDLER_H
00016 
00017 #include "config.h"
00018 
00019 #include "JPathMultiExpression.h"
00020 
00021 #include <vector>
00022 
00023 namespace MC2JSON {
00024 
00025 namespace JPath {
00026 
00028 template <typename MatchType>
00029 class MatchHandler: public MultiExpression::NodeEvaluator {
00030 public:
00031    typedef vector<MatchType> Matches;
00032    MatchHandler():m_first( true ), m_nbrHits( 0 ) { }
00033    virtual ~MatchHandler() { }
00034 
00035    void operator ()( const NodeType& node ) {
00036       handleNewMatch();
00037    }
00038 
00040    void handleNewMatch() {
00041       if ( ! m_first ) {
00042          m_matches.push_back( m_currMatch );
00043       }
00044       m_currMatch = MatchType();
00045       m_first = false;
00046    }
00047    // reset the all matches and start from beginning
00048    void reset() {
00049       m_first = true;
00050       m_nbrHits = 0;
00051       m_matches.clear();
00052       m_currMatch = MatchType();
00053    }
00055    MatchType& getCurrMatch() { return m_currMatch; }
00056 
00058    const Matches& getMatches() const { return m_matches; }
00060    Matches& getMatches() { return m_matches; }
00061 
00063    uint32 getNbrHits() const { return m_nbrHits; }
00065    uint32& getNbrHitsRef() { return m_nbrHits; }
00066 private:
00067    Matches m_matches; 
00068    MatchType m_currMatch; 
00069    bool m_first; 
00070    uint32 m_nbrHits; 
00071 };
00072 
00073 } // JPath
00074 
00075 } // MC2JSON
00076 
00077 #endif // JPATH_MATCH_HANDLER_H
